_sText:
I, Silent Ricochet, did not make this map, I simply modified it to the beta testers' liking. Hope you enjoy it.

Change Log: 

-Added Gun Room
-Added The "Boom" Pyramid
-Added Physical vans and barrels to glass pockets in corner
-Added button to decimate bottom arena. NOTE button only works when a person passes the trigger at the bottom of the cone. 
-Made pit closer to the "cone" to survive fall. The pit is now a very dark arena. 
-Changed properties of glass plates to break under certain conditions to make gameplay more hectic / spectacular. 
-Other small changes to due testers' liking or bugs / glitches in compile process.
